meaningMnemonic: 貨幣 is "<kanji>currency</kanji>" and 価値 is "<kanji>value</kanji>." This shows the <vocabulary>currency value</vocabulary>. Hopefully it's good for you when you visit Japan!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
